name: Lu Tang 0004
content: TANG, Lu TANG, Lu I am an assistant professor (Tenure-Track) at CS of Xiamen University. I am interested in network measurement, anomaly detection, data stream processing, enterprise and data center networks. Email: tanglu (at) xmu (dot) edu (dot) cn Address: Room 203, Haiyun Research Building 1, Haiyun, XMU, China Note I am always looking for strong master students who are interested in networking and systems. If you are interested in my research, please feel free to send me an email. For undergraduate students, please just send me an email if youâ€™re interested in research, or learning more about networking.
